execution_quality: The agent efficiently read the target file and provided substantive review feedback on organization and length, completing the requested review in a single tool call.
work_category: Document review and analysis - the agent read and provided structural feedback on a CV file, identifying length and content organization issues.
summary: The agent reviewed the CV file and provided structural feedback on its organization and length. The user responded with a specific follow-up question about section removal, indicating the review effectively informed their refinement decisions.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately asked clarifying questions about whether dropping sections would make the CV too short, indicating the review was helpful and prompted iterative refinement.
